feed.title: DocuSeal Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for DocuSeal: 1.6.6
entry.content: 🛠 Allow to add signature ID to the document

entry.title: New release for DocuSeal: 1.6.7
entry.content: 🆕 Allow to set webhook secret headers 🆕 Introduce submission expire_at param 🛠 Archive without confirmation alert

entry.title: New release for DocuSeal: 1.6.8
entry.content: 🆕 Add the option to require signature reason collection 🆕 Add /tools/verify API to verify PDF signatures 🛠 Allow to remove field area from the page via field settings

entry.title: New release for DocuSeal: 1.6.9
entry.content: 🛠 Add search on mobile 🛠 Adjust log output 🐞 Fix PDF signature when signing uploaded image files

entry.title: New release for DocuSeal: 1.7.0
entry.content: 🆕 Allow to decline signature with a reason 🆕 Add an option to always generate and download Combined documents with Audit Log
